programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Chan tricks Chandra into working at the coffee shop and it leads to an uncomfortable encounter for Chandra with a former work colleague. Hafiq and Ibrahim continue to squabble, much to Nooraini's disappointment.

programme.title: The Good Doctor S3
programme.desc: Dr. Shaun Murphy and Dr. Morgan Reznik grapple with a terminal cancer patient who is determined to live the last few months of his life without inhibition. Meanwhile, Dr. Reznik must confront her relationship with her mother when she comes in for a third opinion from Dr. Glassman.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S3
programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Ellen's Game Of Games S3
programme.desc: New season of the popular and fun gameshow. Volunteers from Ellen's studio audience play her outrageously fun games including Blindfolded Musical Chairs, Son of a One Eyed Monster, Taste Buds, Scary Go Round, Know or Go and more for the chance to win $100,000.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen finished series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, bad-ass stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets.

programme.title: Donal's Super Food In Minutes
programme.desc: Donal Skehan is the thinking chef's chef. In this highly watchable series, he shows us how to create quick, easy, delicious meals inspired by global cuisine and bursting with flavour. Admired by renowned chefs like Nigella Lawson and Jamie Oliver for his creative, innovative approach to cooking, Donal focuses on everyday cooking, using ten ingredients or less and never spending more than thirty minutes on a meal. With an emphasis on ease, health and flavour he uses pared-back kitchen skills.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Kitchen Notebook: London
programme.desc: Rachel Khoo immerses herself in one of the world's most exciting food destinations - London. Always in pursuit of the perfect way to cure her food cravings, Rachel is shopping, eating and cooking her way around the capital; capturing the city's culinary inspiration like any modern food obsessive - blogging about it, snapping photos, and sketching in her trusty notebook, with the series style reflecting these influences.

programme.title: The Wonderful World Of Baby Animals
programme.desc: Take an inside look at the most important and experimental months of newborn animals' lives. Experience the trials, tribulations and triumphs. See what they get up to when no-one's watching. And find out what drives their joyous - and sometimes strange - behaviour.

programme.title: The Deep S1
programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.title: The Deep S2
programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.title: Top Wing S2
programme.desc: Four young birds - Penny, Rod, Swift, and Brody - become new Top Wing cadets to earn their wings by helping their community.

programme.title: The Enchanted Village Of Pinocchio
programme.desc: THE ENCHANTED VILLAGE OF PINOCCHIO is a fun and positive adaptation of Carlo Collodi's masterpiece. It's a series for the entire family, both moving and funny, where the world of childhood meets the world of fairy tales.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S8
programme.desc: A transport spaceship accidentally drops its cargo of Alien Pet eggs in Ollipolis Park. Ollipolis residents are intrigued, and everyone decides to adopt an Alien Pet of their own. While the Ollie Squad doesn't think much harm of this at first, they're forced to think again when Poly-GON's new scheme comes to light.

programme.title: Agent Binky: Pets Of The Universe
programme.desc: Join Binky and his fellow P.U.R.S.T. agents (Pets of the Universe Ready for Space Travel) as they protect their human families from aliens (code name: ants, flies, grasshoppers and of course, vacuum cleaners)! It's a pretty big job for these small pets, but this paw-some team is certified and ready for action!

programme.title: Sesame Street S49
programme.desc: Catch a brand new segment called "Abby's Amazing Adventures". And look out for special appearances by celebrity guests like Whoopi Goldberg, Zooey Deschanel, Amanda Seyfried and Blake Lively.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S25
programme.desc: Thomas and his friends return for brand new adventures, with an all-new animation look!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S6
programme.desc: Billy is not a huge fan of Halloween, but Tim loves everything about it... except werewolves. A magical mishap turns Billy into a werewolf, spooking Tim. Tim runs away with the only pumpkin left, which is needed to make the cure for Billy. Paula and the rest have to race against the clock to find Tim and pumpkin, or Billy will be stuck as a werewolf forever!

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the ranger's heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesn't know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Before taking a nap, Grizzy locks the food cupboard to prevent the Lemmings from getting into it. And to be sure they cannot force the lock, Grizzy throws all the house tools into the ravine. The Lemmings find a crate of mini building-blocks which enables them to build a hammer... and any other object they wish!

programme.title: Regal Academy - Second Series
programme.desc: The Fairy Godmother gives the students a special assignment: creating an original outfit with shoes. The heroes leave to search for the sparkling Stardust, as they want to decorate their dress with it. During a ball at Cinderella Castle, the villains free the Eating Time Bunny, which stops the clock at midnight, thus making Rose and her family lose all their powers...

programme.title: Winx Club - Eighth Series
programme.desc: The Winx discover that the seventh Prime Star is located on an icy and inhospitable planet: Dyamond. They promptly leave for Dyamond, where they come across a small white fox. But the Trix are also there, and Icy hides a secret about this planet. Sky, who followed the Winx on Dyamond, saves the fox, but when Icy discovers it, furious, she freezes him, causing him to fall into an icy lake...

programme.title: Make It Count S2
programme.desc: Tis the season to be jolly and Maths can help you celebrate with aplomb. Find out why Santa is magical (or impossible) with Maths. Learn how you can set up a secret Santa game that is totally fair with Maths. Put up the perfect Christmas tree and wrap up odd-shaped gifts all using Maths. Maths is the real ingredient that makes your virtual world work.

programme.title: Frogger
programme.desc: The worldwide megahit Frogger franchise hops to life like never before in an outrageously fun, new physical competition series based on the beloved and iconic 1980s video game from Konami. programme.title: The Wall UK S3
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the ranger's collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call. For Grizzy, it's a super-practical way of being waited on by feathered servants, while the Lemmings see it as a golden opportunity to have a squadron which obeys at the drop of a dime.

programme.desc: It's Christmas time, and Rose is excited to find out that Santa Claus really exists. Rose is happy: this is the perfect chance to let her friends and their families discover Christmas magic again!

programme.title: Winx Club - Eighth Series
programme.desc: Icy has frozen Sky, dropping it into an icy lake from the top of a waterfall, so Bloom and the other Winx turn into Sirenix to save him. Icy finally finds herself face to face with the white fox, who is actually her sister Sapphire, once turned into a fox by a treacherous shaman. After saving her, Icy gets the seventh Prime Star, that of brotherly love. Back to Alfea, the Winx come up with a plan to enter Valtor's Palace and steal his Prime Stars...

Rachel gets under the skin of the local cuisine, showing two very different culinary influences, such as Barcelona and rural Spain, or in Italy, Naples and the Amalfi coast.

programme.title: Chef Next Door
programme.desc: Chef Jonas shares the easiest and most practical ways to cook restaurant recipes, some tricks of the trade and chef hacks that he has learned over ten years of working inside a professional kitchen. Each episode teaches viewers how to come up with restaurant quality output from modern urban limitation. Be prepared to see how he bounces back from kitchen struggles like lack of time and budget.

programme.title: Puberteens

programme.title: Puberteens

programme.desc: Donal Skehan is the thinking chef's chef. In this highly watchable series, he shows us how to create quick, easy, delicious meals inspired by global cuisine and bursting with flavour. Admired by renowned chefs like Nigella Lawson and Jamie Oliver for his creative, innovative approach to cooking, Donal focuses on everyday cooking, using ten ingredients or less and never spending more than thirty minutes on a meal. With an emphasis on ease, health and flavour he uses pared-back kitchen skills.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Cosmopolitan Cook
programme.desc: Passionate and creative cook Rachel Khoo goes in search of new ideas in this vibrant and fascinating series. Rachel travels to some of the most beautiful foodie countries in the world, heading for cosmopolitan locations both urban and rural to get inspiration for dinner parties with her friends back home. Rachel gets under the skin of the local cuisine, showing two very different culinary influences, such as Barcelona and rural Spain, or in Italy, Naples and the Amalfi coast.

programme.title: I Want To Be A Towkay
亲家、冤家做头家（中文版）
programme.desc: Hou Xi Li is a handyman. When he was young, he admired a woman who looked like Lin Qing Xia in his kampong. He was obsessed with her and wanted to marry someone like her for years. However, it backfired, resulting in him remaining single at the age of 60. When Hou Xi Li goes to Lucy's house to repair her fan, he accidentally falls and bumps into Lucy, resulting in both resenting each other.

programme.title: Different Cuts, Different Strokes
剪剪大家乐2
programme.desc: The second season of the comedy sitcom returns with its popular stars Kym Ng, Darren Lim, Guo Liang, Mark Lee and Henry Thia.

programme.title: Spring Flower
春花望露
programme.desc: Ep414 - Youtu beats Guangming up when he learns that the latter has teamed up with Lihua and Mr Luo to cheat him. Meanwhile, Youtu meets Lisa, a hostess, when he has a gathering with a business partner.

programme.title: Spring Flower
春花望露
programme.desc: Ep415 - Lifen is overwhelmed when Youzhi asks for a new start with her. On the other hand, Guangming persuades Lihua to buy all the shares from Zhaodi. Lihua agrees.

programme.title: News 8 At One
一点新闻 2022-2023
programme.desc: Weekday afternoon updates on local and world news headlines.

programme.title: Reach For The Skies
不平凡的平凡
programme.desc: Simei got into a heated argument with Zhong Ling because of Zixin. In a state of anger, Zhong Ling told Simei not to interfere in her life. Later, Simei complained to Dacai. She claimed that ever since Zhong Ling befriended Zixin, she had changed into a different person. Shouyi advised Simei not to rely on her children. Instead, she should fed for herself.

programme.title: Playing With Big Toys
小伙伴大玩具
programme.desc: Among the various types of toy trucks, Qian Yi and Asher's favourite is the sewage trucks. The environment friendly duo shares what they love about recycling trucks, and helps to design the future recycling trucks!

programme.title: Body SOS
小毛病大问题
programme.desc: Why is osteoporosis known as a silent disease? What are the factors that increase the risk of having osteoporosis? What are the nutrients that helps to strengthen our bones? How does TCM treat this problem? How can we prevent osteoporosis?

programme.title: Life After Death
那些我爱过的人
programme.desc: Lewen faces pressure with her late husband's siblings fighting over the inheritance and her search for a new home. Yucheng consoles her and they gradually become good friends. Meanwhile, Shuwen passes out at the clinic.

programme.title: Taste of Life
甘味人生
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change.

programme.title: My Mini-Me and Me
很久以后的未来
programme.desc: Zhen Dong duo gets into a fight as the truth about their parents is revealed. Xin Jing finds herself worrying about them both. At work, Zhen Dong shows his fun side to Jia Yi. Mini Zhen Dong takes his frustration out at Shi Xiong, jeopardizing his career. A gathering takes place at the apartment where Luo Wei recognizes the pocket watch and Xin Jing realizes she is also connected to that watch.

programme.title: Hello Singapore
狮城有约
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8.

programme.title: I Want To Be A Towkay
亲家、冤家做头家（中文版）
programme.desc: Hou Xi Li mentions to Gan Zhe that he gets dizzy often, so Gan Zhe reminds him to prevent the three highs. Gan Zhe lives in fear every day because a fortune teller tells him that there will be a misfortune this year. Gan Zhe finally gets to the last day and is relieved that the disaster is over. However, when he finds out that the fortune teller is lying, he flares up and chases after him.

programme.title: Hear U Out
权听你说
programme.desc: Personal happiness was always above fame and fortune for Sheila Sim. What advice does she have for others who are seeking for their lifelong partners on dating apps and how has motherhood changed her?

programme.title: Homegrown Flavours
香港原味道 (第五辑)
programme.desc: Into its fifth series, "Homegrown Flavours" visits Hong Kong's farmland and fish rafts, and explore Hong Kong's agriculture and fishery from the perspective of the millenials. They will go to local fish farms, vegetable gardens, hydroponic vegetable factories, food factories, soy sauce factories, restaurants, etc., to trace the source and find high-quality ingredients made entirely in Hong Kong. The five hosts take turns to become "farming boys" in each episode.

programme.title: Kids' Lives Matter
星空下的仁医
programme.desc: Zhou Zhenyao takes over as the Dean and promotes Mai Haiqi as the Director of Surgery. Cong Xin's research project is suspended. Ganfeng is criticized as Xibei Hospital's liver transplant quota is revoked.

programme.title: Breaking The Silence

programme.desc: Princess Yicheng saves Changge and comes up with a plan to help her save General Luo Yi. She Er accidentally finds out that Changge is a woman. Meanwhile, Ashina Sun plans to get Changge back through a duel.

programme.title: My Teacher Is A Thug

programme.title: YiFong & Eleanor's Kitchen
怡凤和妹妹的厨房
programme.desc: Yifong's beloved heartthrob Elvin Ng is here! She also invites the person who watches her and Eleanor mature over the years - her manager Ada. No local variety shows has ever seen a celebrity's manager come as a guest. What relationship do they share? Realising how the guests can hardly cook, Eleanor decides to whip up something against Elvin. Can this bunch really enjoy a sumptuous dinner today?
